caption.p: Anti-oxidant effects of cashew nuts after CAR-induction. Oxidative stress is a major component of acute inflammatory condition. First line of defense against free radical production ( A) is represented by SOD ( B), CAT ( C), and GSH ( D). Administration of cashew nuts at the dose of 100 mg/kg significantly increased the activity of the anti-oxidant enzymes SOD, CAT, and GSH which had been significantly reduced by carrageenan injection. SOD ( A), CAT ( B), and GSH ( C). See materials and methods for further details. # p < 0.05 vs. CAR; ** p < 0.01 vs. sham; *** p < 0.001 vs. sham.
